languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, я клянусь Золотым Троном, что ваша казна для меня священна! А уж ведение отчетности и вовсе предмет моей гордости — уверен, мои дотошные финансовые летописи найдете удовлетворительными даже вы!" {n}Фактотум говорит пылко и с достоинством, но под {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}вашим грозным взглядом{/d} его воротник все равно стремительно темнеет от пота.{/n}

"Lord Captain, I swear on the Golden Throne that your treasury is sacred to me! I take pride in keeping records of any and all transactions, and I am sure that even you will find my scrupulous financial chronicles to be to your satisfaction!" {n}The Factotum speaks with passion and dignity, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your stern gaze{/d} still causes his collar to darken with sweat in a matter of moments.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, я клянусь Золотым Троном, что ваша казна для меня священна! languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je jure sur le Trône d'Or que votre trésor est sacré à mes yeux ! Je consigne avec le plus grand soin la moindre transaction, et je suis certain que mes registres sauront vous satisfaire en tout point. » {n}Le Factotum s'exprime avec passion et dignité, mais en croisant votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}regard sévère{/d}, il se met à transpirer à grosses gouttes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I swear on the Golden Throne that your treasury is sacred to me! I take pride in keeping records of any and all transactions, and I am sure that even you will find my scrupulous financial chronicles to be to your satisfaction!" {n}The Factotum speaks with passion and dignity, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your stern gaze{/d} still causes his collar to darken with sweat in a matter of moments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je jure sur le Trône d'Or que votre trésor est sacré à mes yeux ! Je consigne avec le plus grand soin la moindre transaction, et je suis certain que mes registres sauront vous satisfaire en tout point. » {n}Le Factotum s'exprime avec passion et dignité, mais en croisant votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}regard sévère{/d}, il se met à transpirer à grosses gouttes.{/n}

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン。黄金の玉座に誓って、あなたの財務は私にとって神聖なものです！あらゆる取引の記録を細心の注意を払って管理しており、その緻密な財務記録に、きっとあなたもご満足いただけると自負しております！」{n}ファクトタムは情熱と威厳をもって語ったが、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}あなたの厳しい視線{/d}を受けて、一瞬のうちに彼の襟元を汗で濡らした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I swear on the Golden Throne that your treasury is sacred to me! I take pride in keeping records of any and all transactions, and I am sure that even you will find my scrupulous financial chronicles to be to your satisfaction!" {n}The Factotum speaks with passion and dignity, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your stern gaze{/d} still causes his collar to darken with sweat in a matter of moments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン。黄金の玉座に誓って、あなたの財務は私にとって神聖なものです！あらゆる取引の記録を細心の注意を払って管理しており、その緻密な財務記録に、きっとあなたもご満足いただけると自負しております！」{n}ファクトタムは情熱と威厳をもって語ったが、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}あなたの厳しい視線{/d}を受けて、一瞬のうちに彼の襟元を汗で濡らした。{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Altın Taht üzerine yemin ederim ki hazineniz benim için kutsaldır! Her türlü işlemin kaydını tutmaktan gurur duyuyorum. Eminim ki titiz mali vakayinamelerim sizi memnun edecektir." {n}Kâhya, tutkuyla ve ağırbaşlılıkla konuşuyor. Buna rağmen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}sert bakışların{/d}, birkaç saniye sonrasında yakasının terden ıslanmasına neden oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I swear on the Golden Throne that your treasury is sacred to me! I take pride in keeping records of any and all transactions, and I am sure that even you will find my scrupulous financial chronicles to be to your satisfaction!" {n}The Factotum speaks with passion and dignity, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your stern gaze{/d} still causes his collar to darken with sweat in a matter of moments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, Altın Taht üzerine yemin ederim ki hazineniz benim için kutsaldır! Her türlü işlemin kaydını tutmaktan gurur duyuyorum. Eminim ki titiz mali vakayinamelerim sizi memnun edecektir." {n}Kâhya, tutkuyla ve ağırbaşlılıkla konuşuyor. Buna rağmen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}sert bakışların{/d}, birkaç saniye sonrasında yakasının terden ıslanmasına neden oluyor.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán, juro por el Trono Dorado que su tesorería es algo sagrado para mí! Me enorgullezco de llevar registros de todas y cada una de las transacciones, ¡y no me cabe duda de que hasta a usted le resultará satisfactorio el meticuloso control de las finanzas!». {n}El Factótum habla con pasión y dignidad, pero tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}severa mirada{/d} sigue haciendo que los cuellos de su ropa se oscurezcan por el sudor al momento.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I swear on the Golden Throne that your treasury is sacred to me! I take pride in keeping records of any and all transactions, and I am sure that even you will find my scrupulous financial chronicles to be to your satisfaction!" {n}The Factotum speaks with passion and dignity, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your stern gaze{/d} still causes his collar to darken with sweat in a matter of moments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán, juro por el Trono Dorado que su tesorería es algo sagrado para mí! Me enorgullezco de llevar registros de todas y cada una de las transacciones, ¡y no me cabe duda de que hasta a usted le resultará satisfactorio el meticuloso control de las finanzas!». {n}El Factótum habla con pasión y dignidad, pero tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}severa mirada{/d} sigue haciendo que los cuellos de su ropa se oscurezcan por el sudor al momento.{/n}

languages.text: “舰长大人，我对黄金王座发誓，您的国库就是我的神圣职责！我会心怀荣耀，将每笔交易切实记录在案。我相信即便是您，也会对我一丝不苟的财务记录感到满意！”{n}尽管高阶顾问的语气充满了激情和尊严，但你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}严厉的目光{/d}还是让他一瞬间大汗淋漓，连衣领都被打湿了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I swear on the Golden Throne that your treasury is sacred to me! I take pride in keeping records of any and all transactions, and I am sure that even you will find my scrupulous financial chronicles to be to your satisfaction!" {n}The Factotum speaks with passion and dignity, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your stern gaze{/d} still causes his collar to darken with sweat in a matter of moments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我对黄金王座发誓，您的国库就是我的神圣职责！我会心怀荣耀，将每笔交易切实记录在案。我相信即便是您，也会对我一丝不苟的财务记录感到满意！”{n}尽管高阶顾问的语气充满了激情和尊严，但你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}严厉的目光{/d}还是让他一瞬间大汗淋漓，连衣领都被打湿了。{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich schwöre beim Goldenen Thron, dass mir Eure Staatskasse heilig ist. Ich führe voller Stolz Buch über jedwede Transaktionen und bin sicher, dass meine sorgsamen finanziellen Chroniken selbst Euch zufriedenstellen werden!" {n}Das Faktotum spricht mit Leidenschaft und Würde, aber dein {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}ernster Blick{/d} tränkt seinen Kragen in kürzester Zeit mit Schweiß.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I swear on the Golden Throne that your treasury is sacred to me! I take pride in keeping records of any and all transactions, and I am sure that even you will find my scrupulous financial chronicles to be to your satisfaction!" {n}The Factotum speaks with passion and dignity, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your stern gaze{/d} still causes his collar to darken with sweat in a matter of moments.{/n}
